ACCORDION_1_TITLE_LABEL: Where will the congress be held?
ACCORDION_1_BODY_LABEL: The congress will be held in a hybrid, face-to-face and online. The face-to-face congress will be held in Jo√£o Pessoa - PB, and the virtual congress will soon be announced on the platform.
ACCORDION_2_TITLE_LABEL: Can articles be made in Portuguese?
ACCORDION_2_BODY_LABEL: No! Articles must be written in English.
ACCORDION_3_TITLE_LABEL: Is there any model for preparing the abstracts?
ACCORDION_3_BODY_LABEL: Yes. The model in .doc and .tex are available at the link:
ACCORDION_4_TITLE_LABEL: Should the registration payment be made before the final submission of the article?
ACCORDION_4_BODY_LABEL: Yes. COBEP 2021 requires all accepted papers to be linked to an AUTHOR submission (ie, not a student or participant application) by one of the paper's authors. The AUTHOR submission allows for submission of self-authored work and allows the inclusion of one (only 1) extra work with additional payment.
ACCORDION_5_TITLE_LABEL: Will the final articles be published?
ACCORDION_5_1_BODY_LABEL: ARTICLES INCLUDED IN COBEP Proceedings ONLY: The length of the articles is a maximum of four (4) pages. This does not include the references;
ACCORDION_5_2_BODY_LABEL: Articles included in the IEEE Xplore Digital Library: The length of IEEE articles is a maximum of eight (8) pages in total. This includes references and appendices. Articles longer than eight pages will be rejected.
ACCORDION_6_TITLE_LABEL: Will the payment for the in-person/virtual registration have the same value?
ACCORDION_6_BODY_LABEL: No, entries have different values. See:
ACCORDION_7_TITLE_LABEL: Can I submit more than one work with the same entry?
ACCORDION_7_BODY_LABEL: Author registration allows the submission of work of own authorship and allows the inclusion of one (only 1) extra article with additional payment.
ACCORDION_8_TITLE_LABEL: How will the virtual platform work?
